Detailed Description

template<typename _Tp, typename _Sequence = std::vector<_Tp>>
class SimSite3D::point_storage< _Tp, _Sequence >

A wrapper class to an STL container class for the point_t and derived datatypes (classes)

Member Function Documentation

template<typename _Tp, typename _Sequence = std::vector<_Tp>>
void SimSite3D::point_storage< _Tp, _Sequence >::bin_points ( const my_float_t  max_dist  )  [inline]

Only call this function after the container is complete (no more objects will be added) and before closest_point, etc.
